overview: Artem is a former restaurant owner. Pandemic made him a bankrupt. He tries to make ends meet and so he works as a courier. It seems like the worst thing ever, but one day someone locks Artem, who delivered an oder, in an empty flat. Unknown person contacts him. He first accuses Artem of illegal breaking in and then suggests a deal. Artem can receive a big sum of money, if he agrees to kill. Otherwise, he would be killed himself.
title: The Order
